entities.name: erin
entities.description: Erin is the one leading the chant against Gryffindor. She has set up a chant saying 'Gryffindor are losers'.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is being targeted by Erin's chant.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina blows her whistle to stop the training session.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is flying on his broom and has spotted the Snitch.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia is nearest to Harry and responds to his question.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie has been injured during the training session.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is flying towards Katie along with Angelina and George.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is flying towards Katie along with Angelina and Fred.

relationships.description: Angelina stopped the training session because Katie was injured.
Fred flew towards Katie along with Angelina and George to help her.
George flew towards Katie along with Angelina and Fred to help her.
